sql.query: select top 20 P1.policy_apln_no, P1.policy_no, P1.user_id, CASE P1.mode WHEN 1 THEN '지급' WHEN 2 THEN '수납' END as mode, CASE P1.srvc_cd WHEN 1 THEN '약대지급' WHEN 2 THEN '약대상환' WHEN 3 THEN 'APL상환' WHEN 4 THEN '배당금' WHEN 5 THEN '휴면보험금' WHEN 6 THEN '보험료수납' WHEN 7 THEN '배당금상계' WHEN 8 THEN '추가보험료수납' END as srvc_name, P1.srvc_cd, CASE P1.pay_cd WHEN 1 THEN '전액' WHEN 2 THEN '일부' WHEN 3 THEN '이자' WHEN '' THEN '' END as pay_name, P1.pay_cd, P1.APLN_DT, P1.apln_amt, P1.bank_cd, P1.acct_no, P1.acct_nm, P1.payor_ssn, P1.payor_nm, P1.payor_phone, P1.payor_email, P1.pay_amt, P1.pay_dt, CASE P1.rslt WHEN '' THEN '접수' WHEN '0' THEN '성공' WHEN '1' THEN '반송' WHEN '2' THEN '실패' WHEN '3' THEN '지연' WHEN 'A' THEN '처리중' END as rslt_name, P1.rslt,P1.bank_conf_yn, P1.err_msg, P1.sending_num, P1.lp_id, CASE CONVERT(CHAR(4),P2.PROC_DT,112) WHEN '1900' THEN '' ELSE CONVERT(CHAR(10),P2.PROC_DT, 121) END AS proc_dt, CASE CONVERT(CHAR(8),P2.PROC_DT,114) WHEN '00:00:00' THEN '' ELSE CONVERT(CHAR(8),P2.PROC_DT, 114) END AS proc_tm, ISNULL(P3.EMP_NM,'') as emp_nm from ( (CYBER.dbo.CYBER_TBL_WB_PAYMENT AS P1 LEFT JOIN CYBER.dbo.CYBER_vw_WB_PROCESS AS P2 ON P1.POLICY_APLN_NO = P2.POLICY_APLN_NO AND P1.RSLT = P2.PROC_STATUS) LEFT JOIN CYBER.dbo.CYBER_TBL_WB_PROC_EMP AS P3 ON P2.PROC_EMP_NO = P3.EMP_NO ) INNER JOIN prudb.dbo.insurancePolicy as P4 ON P1.POLICY_NO = P4.POLICYID where RSLT = '1' $where and P1.policy_apln_no not in ( select top $page P1.policy_apln_no from ( (CYBER.dbo.CYBER_TBL_WB_PAYMENT AS P1 LEFT JOIN CYBER.dbo.CYBER_vw_WB_PROCESS AS P2 ON P1.POLICY_APLN_NO = P2.POLICY_APLN_NO AND P1.RSLT = P2.PROC_STATUS) LEFT JOIN CYBER.dbo.CYBER_TBL_WB_PROC_EMP AS P3 ON P2.PROC_EMP_NO = P3.EMP_NO ) INNER JOIN prudb.dbo.insurancePolicy as P4 ON P1.POLICY_NO = P4.POLICYID where RSLT = '1' $subwhere order by P1.apln_dt desc ) order by P1.apln_dt desc

mapping.getProperty: policy_apln_no, policy_no, user_id, mode, srvc_name, srvc_cd, pay_name,pay_cd, apln_dt, apln_amt, bank_cd, acct_no, acct_nm, payor_ssn, payor_nm,payor_phone, payor_email,pay_amt, pay_dt, rslt_name, rslt, bank_conf_yn,err_msg, sending_num, lp_id, proc_dt, proc_tm, emp_nm
